title: Disclosures (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 27 of 2022), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Protected Disclosures (Amendment) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Protected Disclosures (Amendment) Act 

2022 (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited protected disclosure (amendment) act 2022 (commencement) order 2022

title: Disclosures (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 27 of 2022), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The 1st day of January 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of January 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
Protected Disclosures (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 27 of 2022) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 October, 2022. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 14th October, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [510] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
